title: Heroes A2Z #8: Holiday Holdup
description: You better watch out, you better not fight.You better not doubt I’m stealing this night.Candy Claws is comin’ to town!In this adventure, Christmas is in danger. Candy bandits cheat down chimneys looking to poach the presents placed under the tree. If the heroes don’t wrap up the bandits tight, there won’t even be coal in their stockings on Christmas morn.
author: David Anthony
